noun.description: (with reference to food) the state of being recently made or obtained or not having decayed.
examples: the restaurant's selling point is the freshness of its ingredients

noun.description: The quality of being pleasantly new or different.
examples: he brings freshness to a familiar story
the commentary should display freshness of insight
his freshness, passion, and focus got him cast in leading roles

noun.description: (with reference to wind) the quality of being cool and fairly strong.
examples: the freshness of the wind with its cooling air
